summary: This mod adds Dirks to Skyrim. Dirks are similar to daggers, but have a much longer blade.
descriptionHtml: Dirks deal more damage per hit, but have pathetic damage per second. However, they still retain the 15X damage sneak attack bonus that Daggers have. In addition this mod adds the Dirk of Cronus hidden in Skyrim (trust me, someone who wants it will probably find it easily). I am currently using the dagger models as placeholders. Eventually I will make my own models.
author: Therelativejolt
